title: Recognizing Faces
description: A short lesson to help you apply Recognizing Faces.

hook.text: Your phone unlocks by scanning your face in 0.3 seconds. How does it know it's you?

buildup.text: Facial recognition maps key points â€” distance between eyes, jawline shape, nose width.

discovery.text: It converts your face into a unique numerical fingerprint and compares it against stored ones.

twist.text: Identical twins can fool some systems, and lighting changes trip up cheaper models.

climax.text: China uses it for payments. The EU debates banning it in public spaces.

punchline.text: Your face is a password you can never change.

quiz.question: How does facial recognition identify a person?
options: Maps facial features into a numerical fingerprint
